name: Task Manager Extension
author: LW Codes
description: This extension is like a personal assistant for your browser, seamlessly blending functionality with flair. Dive into your day with a dynamic to-do list that keeps you on track, while the daily focus feature sharpens your concentration on what truly matters. Let the background images transport you to your happy place as you conquer tasks, and savor a daily dose of inspiration with fresh, motivational quotes. Elevate your work game while adding a dash of joy to your online workspace!
